      • Vertex

        public Vertex(Vertex v)
        Copy constructor. Copies all satellite data but leaves adjacency list and parent of new vertex empty or, in the case of parent, null.
        Parameters:
        v - vertex to be copied

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(Vertex vertexToCopy,
      Vertex vertexParent)
        Copies all satellite data from vertexToCopy and assigns vertexParent as parent. Adjacency list is empty on initialization
        Parameters:
        vertexToCopy - vertex from which to copy satellite data
        vertexParent - parent to assign to new vertex

        Set the graph to which the vertex belongs

      • addAdjacency

        public boolean addAdjacency(Vertex v)
        Adds the specified vertex to the set of adjacencies
        Parameters:
        v - vertex to be added
        Returns:
        true if the adjacency list did not already contain v

      • removeAdjacency

        public boolean removeAdjacency(Vertex v)
        Removes the specified vertex from the adjacency set
        Parameters:
        v - vertex to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the vertex was found in the adjacency set

      • clearAdjacencies

        public void clearAdjacencies()
        Removes all vertices from the adjacency set. The adjacency set will be empty after this call returns.

      • containsAdjacency

        public boolean containsAdjacency(Vertex v)
        Returns true if the adjacency set contains the specified vertex
        Parameters:
        v - vertex whose presence is to be tested
        Returns:
        true if v is found in the adjacency set
